LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeBR.label: charge shot
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeBR.label: charge caster
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeBR.description: Usually referred as "GEN 2" or "Charge battle rifle", the charge caster is a heavier variant of the charge rifle. It earned lengthened range and higher punch in exchange for slow fire rate and increased weight.
